DOC.brief_summary: This project complete intervention design teach parent child age 0-2 year age prevent injury child . The intervention consist two DVD package information create safe home environment correctly choose instal appropriate car safety seat . The study hypothesis parent use intervention would score significantly high measure knowledge , motivation , intention self-efficacy implement injury prevention strategy .
DOC.criteria: 18 year old Parent whose old child 024 month old Speak read English Have internet access ( online study ) Parents legal physical custody Subjects live household family member overnight stay hospital result injury last 2 year
